localised_text.tooltip_text: Options BROKEN BUTTON, WIP, DON'T BUG PLEASE

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse( FrontendRoot.IngameMessagingContext.IsReady, (begin_index = (this.ChildIndex - 1) * 3, items = FrontendRoot.IngameMessagingContext.FilteredNewsItems) => { items[begin_index : GetIfElse(begin_index + 3 > items.Size, items.Size, begin_index + 3)] }, Generate(3))
